amendment.description: Amendment ensures that the study on Ozone formation contained in the bill analyzes the relative contribution from wildfires.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 114-607 to ensure that the study on Ozone formation contained in the bill analyzes the relative contribution from wildfires.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Gosar.
